reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I reviewed a similar mirror recently and I loved it so much I had to try another!
reviews.reviewText: Talk about a nifty shower life hack! Hard to see angels especially on the lady body even something simply like armpits can be so complicated to clean or shave you're at risk of injuring yourself.I think this 3m is strong enough to work on textured surfaces but mine is smooth full disclosure. It's strong enough to hold but not too strong to remove when you need to. Everything you need is included the hook and the 3m. The claim it makes of being anti fog is GENUINE obviously that's nice considering I take all my showers hot.I don't know why but I started using it to make sure the bottom of my feet are clean incredibly versatile and shatterproof I fell on this one with my entire bodyweight it's fine. The mirror will not solve my wobbly problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel / Camping Mirror
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mirror for camping / hiking. It's very strong material and perfectly reflective. It comes with a hook for installing it somewhere, but in my mind that would kind of defeat the purpose. Just toss it in the backpack and have it when you need it. At least that's how I'm using it, and am happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars All fog shaving mirror - immediate fogged up in shower. Other than that, meh.
reviews.reviewText: Build is cheap/flimsy, feels like it was made for $0.05. Need to use a little soap/shampoo/conditioner on mirror, fogs up immediately in shower. Also hazy in general. Tried it with and without the protective film, was foggy/hazy either way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin, lightweight, shatterproof and very clear mirror
reviews.reviewText: I could not find anything negative about this mirror. I have been hanging a square mirror in the shower to shave for a long time and recently it was knocked off and cracked the glass (thankfully it did not shatter everywhere). Recognizing that is not very safe I found this one and it is great. It's very thin meaning it sits very flat against the wall. It is large but not too large to use as a shaving mirror. It is edge to edge with no bezel which makes it look very nice. I was also struck by how clear it is - better than my traditional glass mirror in my opinion. All around great solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is great! For this price point, I was really expecting the mirror not to be very clear, and for my reflection to be a bit distorted. But the reflection is sharp and looks perfect! This mirror does not fog up AT ALL in the shower with me, even though my regular mirror over the sink gets totally fogged up. And I love that it won't shatter if it falls. A really great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t fog and easy to install. Great value for price.

reviews.reviewText: inaccurate description. don’t buy it is not anti fog
